FAQ

"Why not use a drive-thru carwash?"

Drive-thru car washes may potentially damage your paint, leaving micro-scratches from the large bristled brushes.

"Will my paint get damaged?"

Not at all! We use proven techniques to avoid any paint damage.

"Will I have to drop my car off?"

Nope, we'll come to you!

"How much do you charge?"

Broughton Detail's rates start at just $35!

Click here for more info on services and pricing.

"Do you accept credit cards?"

At the moment, no. Only cash or paypal/venmo is accepted.

"How long will the detail take??"

It really depends which package is chosen and what type of car you have, but average time ranges from about 1.5 hours to 4 hours.

Click here for more info on service time-frames.
